modName: Charming High Heels for CBBE HDT
summary: Charming High Heels for CBBE Body Shape and HDT high heels system.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Start:[/size][/color][/i][/b]
This mod adds a set of high heels to the game. It's for female characters(include followers) only. You can craft platforms under the cloth/hide/iron section(no need any armors perk). And they belong cloth/light/heavy armor.
I used PVC structure from 1.2. It means [color=#f1c232]Platform + Vamp + Counter(optional) = shoes[/color]. So you can build up different styles.
I used bodyparts slot 53 for vamps, 52 for counters and 49 for stockings. This maybe useful if you know what that means. :)


[youtube]quYPEHxoHJ4[/youtube] [youtube]XqiEdqygsUw[/youtube]

Fun with new CBBE HDT body.
The amazing dance mod is Dance Synchronizator 3.4: [url=http://casualmods.net/DanceSynchronizator/DSMainEng.html]http://casualmods.net/DanceSynchronizator/DSMainEng.html[/url], really love it!

[b][i][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Changelog:
[/size][/color][/i][/b]V.1.4
Merged UNPs platform
Added Ankle to Live
Added 3 stockings ([color=#f1c232]not support UNPs yet[/color], check posts for more informations)

V.1.3
Tweaked feet mesh, more natural
Fixed normals and specular issue
Add counter 3 and vamp 3/4/5
Counter 3 and vamp 1/3/5 have more [color=#f1c232]zap options[/color] in bodyslide
Add platform NPC version for compatibility, let followers wear it if they use [color=#f1c232]custom texture[/color] pack
Add temper recipe for improve platform in workbench
Default height set to XPMS Extended 2.06, you need change the Global Height Offset(to make it higher or lower) in the MCM menu of HDT if you still use XPMS 1.93a

V.1.2
Tweaked feet mesh, more natural
Redesigned platform 1 and vamp 2
Add 2 counters and another platform
Add HD Textures
Removed HD Mesh, instead of using Optimized Mesh. It means good balance between performance impact and high detail.

V.1.1
Add another vamp

[b][i][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Installation:[/size][/color][/i][/b]
Use NMM or Manual Download and extract all in the rar file into your skyrim\data folder.

[b][i][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Uninstallation:[/size][/color][/i][/b]
Use NMM or manual delete CharmingHighHeels.esp and CharmingHighHeels.bsa in your skyrim\data folder.

[b][i][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Requirements:[/size][/color][/i][/b]
1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente
[/b][/url]2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by [b]dimon99[/b][/url] (or UNP series)
3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by [b]hydrogensayshdt[/b][/url]

[b][i][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Credits:[/size][/color][/i][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and TBBP HDT by [b]ChronoTrigger77[/b][/url] - for feet mesh and CT77 is a great modder. 

[b][i][size=4][color=#3d85c6]Compatibility:[/color]
[/size][/i][/b]1. Don't install this mod if you do NOT use CBBE Body Shape. otherwise you will get mesh/texture issues.
2. There are counter slots conflict with Schlongs of Skyrim.
2. It should be compatible with other mods.

[b][i][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Custom:[/size][/color][/i][/b]
Download uv map files and paint your favorite colors then save them to your skyrim\data\textures\clothes\chighheels folder, you need make the folder if it does not exist.
1. ******_d.dds --- texture map
2. ******_n.dds --- normal map (and specular map in alpha chanel)
3. ******_em.dds --- environment mask map
And if you dont like the custom color, just delete it in order to make the model using original textures.

[b][i][color=#3d85c6][size=4]End:
[/size][/color][/i][/b]Enjoy it and sorry for machine translation!
author: arison_c
